posts.post_content:
I have this Grimshaw Broadleaf 350 to trade.  This is a beautiful card with sharp corners; the poor grade is from the paper loss along the bottom on the back.  

I am looking for a t206 HOFer with an AB 350 frame or AB 460 back or a t206 Waddell (any pose) in an SGC 50. 

Thanks,

David R.
